definition: any of various platforms built into a vessel, knock down with force
details:
noun
- any of various platforms built into a vessel
- street name for a packet of illegal drugs
- a porch that resembles the deck on a ship
- a pack of 52 playing cards
= synonyms: pack of cards, deck of cards
verb
- knock down with force
= example: knock down with force
= synonyms: dump, floor, coldcock
- decorate
= example: decorate
= synonyms: bedight, bedeck
- be beautiful to look at
= synonyms: grace, beautify, embellish, decorate, adorn
